required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Cetuximab and Vemurafenib Plus FOLFIRI for BRAF V600E Mutated Advanced Colorectal Cancer (IMPROVEMENT)
clinical_study.official_title: Cetuximab and Vemurafenib Plus FOLFIRI for BRAF V600E Mutated Advanced Colorectal Cancer (IMPROVEMENT): A Single-arm Study

brief_summary.textblock: This clinical trial aims to evaluate the efficacy, safety of FOLFIRI with vemurafenib and cetuximab in Advanced Colorectal Cancer Patients with BRAF V600E mutation.

primary_outcome.description: Evaluation of tumor burden based on RECIST criteria every 3 cycles(each cycle is 14 days), ORR is the proportion of patients with reduction in tumor burden of a predefined amount, including complete response and partial response.

secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of tumor burden based on RECIST criteria every 3 cycles(each cycle is 14 days), and DCR is the proportion of patients with reduction in tumor burden of a predefined amount, including complete response, partial response and stable disease

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time from treatment beginning until the date of first documented progression, assessed up to 55 months
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of tumor burden based on RECIST criteria until first documented progress through study completion, an average of 6 weeks

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time from treatment beginning until date of death from any cause, assessed up to 55 months
secondary_outcome.description: From date of treatment beginning until the date of death from any cause, through study completion, an average of 6 weeks

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 4 weeks

arm_group.description: Irinotecan 180mg/m2 iv gtt (14 days per course) leucovorin 400mg/m2 iv gtt (14 days per course) 5-fluorouracil 400mg/m2 iv (14 days per course) 5-fluorouracil 2400 mg/m2 46h (14 days per course) vemurafenib 960mg po bid cetuximab 500mg/m2 iv gtt (14 days per course)

responsible_party.investigator_title: A single center clinical study of FOLFIRI with vemurafenib and cetuximab in Advanced Colorectal Cancer Patients with BRAF V600E mutation.
